name: Quad-It: FPV Simulator
description:
Fly your way through the best feeling FPV simulator out there!

  • 3 maps to fly around, create courses, and explore.
  • Course editor with automated time trial generation.
  • Race the ghost of your previous lap.
  • Extremely realistic flight dynamics.
  • Easily import and export courses with a text based import/export system.
  • Switch between 3 views:  FPV, line of sight, or third person view.

It is highly recommended that you fly in Quad-It with a gamepad or radio transmitter / joystick, it is possible to fly with a keyboard just for freestyle, but it is near impossible to race with.

Changes:

1.01

-Fixed reset yaw button entering wrong number into settings
